meanings.definition: Maquiladoras: factories in Mexico that import materials duty-free for assembly and export.
meanings.sent1: The maquiladoras in Mexico help in assembling products for export.
meanings.sent2: Many companies set up maquiladoras near the border for cost-effective production.
meanings.sent3: The maquiladoras threw a party to celebrate reaching their export target.
meanings.sent4: The maquiladoras were like busy beehives, buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the maquiladoras gave a glimpse into the manufacturing process.
